mapper.select: select count(*) from board where delete_yn ='N'

select board_id , title ,contents ,writer_nickname ,read_count ,register_date ,city_name ,district_name ,ts1.low_name give_talent , ts2.low_name receive_talent ,gender from board join district using(district_code,city_code)join city using(city_code) join talent_small ts1 on board.give_talent=ts1.low_code join talent_small ts2 on board.receive_talent=ts2.low_code join member m on board.writer_nickname = m.nickname where board_id = #{board_id}

select board_id ,title ,contents ,city_name ,district_name ,ts1.low_name give_talent , ts2.low_name receive_talent
from board join district using(district_code, city_code) join city using(city_code) join talent_small ts1 on board.give_talent = ts1.low_code join talent_small ts2 on board.receive_talent = ts2.low_code where board_id = #{board_id}

select BOARD.BOARD_ID, BOARD.CONTENTS, BOARD.READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(BOARD.REGISTER_DATE, 'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD' ) AS register_date, GIVE_TALENT.LOW_NAME as giveTalentLowName, RECEIVE_TALENT.LOW_NAME as receiveTalentLowName, u.CITY_NAME AS city_name, u.DISTRICT_NAME AS district_name from ( select BOARD_ID, BOARD.CONTENTS, READ_COUNT, REGISTER_DATE, GIVE_TALENT, RECEIVE_TALENT, CITY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE from BOARD order by READ_COUNT DESC ) BOARD JOIN TALENT_SMALL GIVE_TALENT ON GIVE_TALENT.LOW_CODE = BOARD.GIVE_TALENT JOIN TALENT_SMALL RECEIVE_TALENT ON RECEIVE_TALENT.LOW_CODE = BOARD.RECEIVE_TALENT JOIN ( SELECT c.city_code, d.city_code AS district_city_code, c.city_name, d.district_name, d.district_code FROM CITY c JOIN DISTRICT d ON c.city_code = d.city_code) u ON BOARD.city_code = u.city_code AND BOARD.district_code = u.district_code
where rownum <= 6
